TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local islands = 0 local swamps = 0
local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_ISLAND ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() islands = filter:CountStopAt( 1 )
filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:AddSubType( LAND_TYPE_SWAMP ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted() swamps = filter:CountStopAt( 1 )
if TriggerObject() ~= nil and islands < 1 and swamps < 1 then TriggerObject():ComesIntoPlayTapped() end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local decision = Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult()
if decision == 0 then ProduceMana("U",1) elseif decision == 1 then ProduceMana("B",1) end
